name: flutter-gridview-builder
description: Visual tool for experimenting with Flutter GridView layouts. Generate Dart code instantly.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run minify && npm run copy
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:standalone
scripts.copy: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:js
scripts.copy:html: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/embed.html dist/embed.html
scripts.copy:js: cp src/js/gridview-builder.js dist/gridview-builder.js && cp src/js/gridview-builder-standalone.js dist/gridview-builder-standalone.js
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: npm run build && cp -r dist/* docs/ && git add docs && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push
